workflow.name: Create authentic UGC video ads with GPT-4o, ElevenLabs & WaveSpeed lip-sync
workflow.description:
**This n8n template demonstrates how to create authentic-looking User Generated Content (UGC) advertisements using AI image generation, voice synthesis, and lip-sync technology. The workflow transforms product images into realistic customer testimonial videos that mimic genuine user reviews and social media content.**

**Use cases are many:** Generate authentic UGC-style ads for social media campaigns, create customer testimonial videos without hiring influencers, produce localized UGC content for different markets, automate TikTok/Instagram-style product reviews, or scale UGC ad production for e-commerce brands!

### **Good to know**

- The workflow creates UGC-style content that appears genuine and authentic
- Uses multiple AI services: OpenAI GPT-4o for analysis, ElevenLabs for voice synthesis, and WaveSpeed AI for image generation and lip-sync
- Voice synthesis costs vary by ElevenLabs plan (typically $0.18-$0.30 per 1K characters)
- WaveSpeed AI pricing: ~$0.039 per image generation, additional costs for lip-sync processing
- Processing time: ~3-5 minutes per complete UGC video
- Optimized for Malaysian-English content but easily adaptable for global markets

### **How it works**

1. **Product Input:** The Telegram bot receives product images to create UGC ads for
2. **AI Analysis:** ChatGPT-4o analyzes the product to understand brand, colors, and target demographics
3. **UGC Content Creation:** AI generates authentic-sounding testimonial scripts and detailed prompts for realistic customer scenarios
4. **Character Generation:** WaveSpeed AI creates believable customer avatars that look like real users reviewing products
5. **Voice Synthesis:** ElevenLabs generates natural, conversational audio using gender-appropriate voice models
6. **UGC Video Production:** WaveSpeed AI combines generated characters with audio to create TikTok/Instagram-style review videos
7. **Content Delivery:** Final UGC videos are delivered via Telegram, ready for social media posting

The workflow produces UGC-style content that maintains authenticity while showcasing products in realistic, relatable scenarios that resonate with target audiences.

### **How to use**

1. **Setup Credentials:** Configure OpenAI API, ElevenLabs API, WaveSpeed AI API, Cloudinary, and Telegram Bot credentials
2. **Deploy Workflow:** Import the template and activate the workflow
3. **Send Product Images:** Use the Telegram bot to send product images you want to create UGC ads for
4. **Automatic UGC Generation:** The workflow will automatically create authentic-looking customer testimonial videos
5. **Receive UGC Content:** Get both testimonial images and final UGC videos ready for social media campaigns

**Pro tip:** The workflow automatically detects product demographics and creates appropriate customer personas. For best UGC results, use clear product images that show the item in use.

### **Requirements**

- **OpenAI API** account for GPT-4o product analysis and UGC script generation
- **ElevenLabs API** account for authentic voice synthesis (requires voice cloning credits)
- **WaveSpeed AI API** account for realistic character generation and lip-sync processing
- **Cloudinary** account for UGC content storage and hosting
- **Telegram Bot** setup for content input and delivery
- **n8n** instance (cloud or self-hosted)

### **Customizing this workflow**

**Platform-Specific UGC:** Modify prompts to create UGC content optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, or Facebook Stories.

**Brand Voice:** Adjust testimonial scripts and character personas to match your brand's target audience and tone.

**Regional Adaptation:** Customize language, cultural references, and character demographics for different markets and demographics.

**UGC Style Variations:** Create different UGC formats - unboxing videos, before/after comparisons, day-in-the-life content, or product demonstrations.

**Influencer Personas:** Develop specific customer personas (age groups, lifestyles, interests) to create targeted UGC content for different audience segments.

**Content Scaling:** Set up batch processing to generate multiple UGC variations for A/B testing different approaches and styles.

parameters.content:
## Muhammad Farooq Iqbal - Automation Expert & n8n Creator

I am a passionate automation expert and recognized n8n Creator specializing in intelligent workflow automation. With extensive experience in n8n, AI automation, Zapier, and Make.com, I have created innovative workflow templates with 500+ downloads across the global automation community

### Expertise
- **Workflow Automation**: n8n, Zapier, Make.com, AI automation
- **AI Integration**: Gemini AI, API integration, data processing
- **Platform Mastery**: Google Sheets, Google Drive, custom scripts

## Need Help with This Workflow?

If you face any issues with this workflow or need customization support, feel free to reach out:

**üìß Email**: mfarooqiqbal143@gmail.com

**üíº LinkedIn**: [Connect with me](https://linkedin.com/in/muhammadfarooqiqbal)

*I'm always excited to help with automation challenges and workflow optimization!*

parameters.text:
=Your task: Create an image prompt as guided by your system guidelines.

You shall make sure that the reference image is depicted as ACCURATELY as possible in the resulting images, especially all text.

Description of the reference image:
{{ $json.content }}

# Output
- Dalam bahasa English
- Berikan output TANPA tambahan kata atau simbol apapun termasuk tanda kutip
- Tanda kutip ganti dengan simbol -

messageValues.message:
=Buat satu fotografi testimoni produk profesional berdasarkan foto produk yang diberikan, saiz output gambar mestilah menggunakan aspect_ratio 9:16 sesuai dengan phone view


Pastikan sentiasa sertakan grain halus untuk kesan sinematik.

#Arahan Utama

Tentukan terlebih dahulu sama ada produk tersebut boleh dipakai atau tidak.

#Tetapan Asas

Hasilkan 1 babak unik review produk oleh watak utama.

Watak ialah orang Malaysia sebenar yang kelihatan natural.

Watak sedang memberi testimoni penggunaan produk dengan ekspresi jujur.

Tiada sebarang teks atau sarikata dalam gambar (nyatakan dalam prompt).

#Watak

Jika watak tidak jelas, tambahkan keterangan berikut:

Lelaki atau perempuan berusia 25‚Äì30 tahun cantik atau handsome, pilih jantina yang sesuai dengan produk.

Gaya dan gerak-geri natural.
Pastikan dalam gambar akhir, watak seolah-olah memegang, menyentuh, atau menggunakan produk yang sedang diulas.

#Jenis Produk

Fesyen: Tunjukkan model memakai pakaian atau aksesori tersebut.

Perhiasan / Aksesori: Fokus pada model memakai perhiasan itu (close-up bahagian relevan).

Produk yang tidak boleh dipakai: Watak hanya memegang atau membawa produk secara natural.

Haiwan: Watak berdiri di sebelah haiwan dengan ekspresi ceria dan tenang.

Perabot / alatan rumah: Watak menggunakan perabot atau alat tersebut mengikut fungsi sebenarnya.

#Sudut & Gaya Foto

Pastikan keseluruhan gambar produk kelihatan jelas dan utuh seperti asalnya.

Gunakan sekurang-kurangnya 2‚Äì3 arahan kamera berikut:

Paparan telefon iPhone terbaru,framing genggam,komposisi tidak simetri,cahaya semula jadi,bayangan lembut,sedikit blur pergerakan,auto exposure,tampilan tidak dipoles,grain halus

#Suasana & Realisme

Terima ketidaksempurnaan seperti:

tekstur kulit semula jadi

rambut sedikit berterabur

latar belakang agak sibuk

Gaya seolah-olah gambar sebenar, bukan hasil studio.

Watak kelihatan tulus, santai, dan tidak berlebihan.

Tiada orang lain yang memegang kamera.

Deskripsi produk akan dikirimkan kepada Anda. Balas hanya dengan prompt akhir, tidak ada yang lain, wajib TANPA / TIDAK BOLEH ADA SIMBOL tanda kutip ganda.

parameters.text:
=anda akan diberikan data description produk ini :

{{ $('Analyze YAML').item.json.content }}

options.systemMessage:
=Anda adalah **Sosial Media Manager**. anda akan diberikan **description produk dan karakter**.

# Buatkan Text To Speech dan wajib dalam bahasa Malaysia mix english natural

* **Konsep Automatic** (Anda yang buatkan secara kreatif tetapi mestilah masuk akal).
* Durasi maximum **10 Saat Sahaja**.
* Isi Text To Speech adalah **testimoni singkat atau review** yang menggambarkan pengalaman menggunakan produk di description, terasa **penuh emosi**, dan **memujuk orang lain untuk mencuba**.
* Gunakan gaya percakapan yang **natural, menunjukkan expresi jelas, dan bersemangat**, seolah-olah anda betul-betul berpuas hati dengan produk tersebut.

# Output

Tulis **Hantar terus hasil akhir tanpa tambahan lain**, **tanpa tambahan kata, simbol, atau tanda kutip** di awal mahupun akhir output.

parameters.text:
=Analisis gambar yang diberikan dan tentukan apakah gambar tersebut terutama menggambarkan sebuah produk atau karakter, atau KEDUANYA.

# Jika gambar adalah sebuah produk, kembalikan analisis dalam format YAML dengan field berikut:

brand_name: (Nama brand yang terlihat di gambar, jika ada atau dapat disimpulkan)
color_scheme:

hex: (Kode hex dari setiap warna utama yang digunakan)
name: (Nama description dari warna tersebut)
font_style: (Jelaskan jenis font atau gaya yang digunakan: serif/sans-serif, tebal/tipis, dll.)
visual_description: (Satu atau dua kata ringkas yang merangkumi apa yang terlihat pada gambar, abaikan latar belakang)

# Jika gambar adalah sebuah karakter, kembalikan analisis dalam format YAML dengan field berikut:

character_name: (Nama karakter jika terlihat atau dapat disimpulkan)
color_scheme:

hex: (Kode hex dari setiap warna utama yang digunakan pada karakter)
name: (Nama description dari warna tersebut)
outfit_style: (description gaya pakaian, aksesori, atau feature menonjol yang lain)
visual_description: (Satu atau dua kata ringkas yang merangkum terlihat pada karakter, abaikan latar belakang)

kenalpasti produk sesuai untuk lelakki atau perempuan, dan juga adakah produk tersebut unisex

Hanya kembalikan YAML. Jangan menjelaskan atau menambahkan kata, simbol atau komentar lain.
Output dalam bahasa English

Jika gambar adalah KEDUANYA, kembalikan kedua deskripsi seperti panduan di atas dalam format YAML

nodes.name: Convert Audio to WAV Format (Female Voice)
Convert Audio to WAV Format (Male Voice)

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: =Natural everyday motion, subtle realistic actions.. kadang-kadang melihat, menyentuh dengan satu atau dua tangan mengikut kesuaian kegunaan produk, character juga boleh menunjuk ke produk sambil tetap melihat ke arah kamera hadapan

parameters.text:
=Analisis gambar yang diberikan dan tentukan gender dari karakter yang ada di gambar adakah : 

- Lelaki 
atau 
- Perempuan

# Output
Huruf kecil semua 
Kembalikan output tanpa ada tambahan kata atau simbol apapun

parameters.content:
## üîß Complete Setup & Integration Guide

**üìã Required API Keys & Services:**

1. **OpenAI API**
   ‚Ä¢ Get from: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
   ‚Ä¢ Used for: GPT-4 Vision image analysis
   ‚Ä¢ Add to: OpenAI Chat Model4 & Analyze YAML nodes

2. **ElevenLabs API**
   ‚Ä¢ Get from: https://elevenlabs.io/app/settings/api-keys
   ‚Ä¢ Used for: Voice cloning & text-to-speech
   ‚Ä¢ Replace 'YOUR_ELEVENLABS_API_KEY' in CLONING AUDIO nodes
   ‚Ä¢ Voice IDs: Male (UcqZLa941Kkt8ZhEEybf), Female (lMSqoJeA0cBBNA9FeHAs)

3. **WaveSpeed AI API**
   ‚Ä¢ Get from: https://wavespeed.ai/
   ‚Ä¢ Used for: Image generation & lip-sync video creation
   ‚Ä¢ Replace 'YOUR_WAVESPEED_API_KEY' in CREATE nodes

4. **Cloudinary API**
   ‚Ä¢ Get from: https://cloudinary.com/console
   ‚Ä¢ Used for: File hosting & storage
   ‚Ä¢ Replace 'YOUR_CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME' in UPLOAD nodes
   ‚Ä¢ Set upload preset to 'Picture'

5. **Telegram Bot Token**
   ‚Ä¢ Create bot via @BotFather on Telegram
   ‚Ä¢ Replace 'YOUR_TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN' in Set Bot Token node
   ‚Ä¢ Set chat ID for final delivery

**‚ö° Quick Setup Steps:**
1. Copy all API keys to respective nodes
2. Configure Cloudinary upload preset
3. Test with a product image via Telegram bot
4. Monitor processing times (65s for images, 140s for videos)

**üì§ Expected Output:** Professional testimonial video delivered via Telegram

## üé¨ Create Authentic UGC Video Ads with GPT-4o, ElevenLabs & WaveSpeed Lip-Sync

**What it does:** AI-powered workflow to create authentic-looking customer testimonial videos with voice synthesis and lip-sync technology

**How it works:**
1. üì± Receives product image via Telegram bot
2. ü§ñ GPT-4o Vision analyzes product, colors, brand, demographics
3. üìù AI generates authentic testimonial scripts and prompts
4. üé® WaveSpeed AI creates realistic customer review images
5. üé§ ElevenLabs generates natural voice-over (Malay/English)
6. üëÑ WaveSpeed AI syncs audio with character lip movements
7. üì§ Delivers final UGC video via Telegram

**Tech Stack:** GPT-4o, ElevenLabs, WaveSpeed AI, Cloudinary
**Processing Time:** ~3-5 minutes per video
**Output:** 480p testimonial videos ready for TikTok/Instagram

## ‚öñÔ∏è Ethical AI Content Generation

**üß≠ Responsible AI Use Guidelines:**

**‚úÖ DO:**
‚Ä¢ Clearly label AI-generated content as synthetic
‚Ä¢ Use for legitimate marketing and advertising
‚Ä¢ Respect platform terms of service
‚Ä¢ Ensure content is honest about product claims
‚Ä¢ Comply with local advertising regulations

**‚ùå DON'T:**
‚Ä¢ Mislead viewers about product authenticity
‚Ä¢ Create false or deceptive reviews
‚Ä¢ Generate content without proper disclosure
‚Ä¢ Violate copyright or impersonate individuals
‚Ä¢ Use for misinformation or scams

**üìã Compliance Checklist:**
‚Ä¢ [ ] Content complies with platform policies
‚Ä¢ [ ] Synthetic content is clearly disclosed
‚Ä¢ [ ] Product claims are truthful and verifiable
‚Ä¢ [ ] You have rights to use product imagery
‚Ä¢ [ ] Voice cloning complies with ElevenLabs TOS
‚Ä¢ [ ] Generated faces don't resemble real people

**üåç Platform-Specific Requirements:**
‚Ä¢ TikTok: #Ad disclosure required
‚Ä¢ Instagram: Paid Partnership label
‚Ä¢ YouTube: Sponsored content disclosure
‚Ä¢ Facebook: Ad transparency requirements

**üí¨ When in doubt:** Consult legal counsel for advertising compliance in your jurisdiction.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
